headline: V2X Takes Off with Bell Helicopter to Train the Army's Next Generation of Aviators
summary: V2X Inc. (NYSE: VVX) is pleased to announce its collaboration with Bell Textron Inc., a Textron company (NYSE: TXT), to begin strategic planning for the U.S. Army's Flight School Next program. As part of this effort, V2X is collaborating with Bell, DigiFlight, Delaware Resource Group, and TRU Simulation to pursue this critical training initiative.

headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid TXT and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the last six months, Textron shares have sunk to $76.51, producing a disappointing 11.1% loss - worse than the S&P 500’s 1% drop. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
